segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the woman so unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink overflowing quietly, ruining the kitchen bit by bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the water, and she keeps working on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking everything for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that wobbly stool, so high up and vulnerable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down painfully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, reaching for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this mischief could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside just highlights the sadness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for them; accidents are bound to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll be devastated if the cabinets get damaged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a simple moment turning potentially tragic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish I could warn them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
